title: Charming Historic Loft with Balcony in Tranquil Polnocne
description: Experience old-world charm and modern comfort in this remarkable 3-bedroom loft, set across a spacious 142 sqm. The property enchants with its soaring ceilings and instantly inviting warm brickwork. Natural light fills the open-concept living space thanks to restored oversized industrial windows, while a generous balcony provides the perfect spot for your morning coffee. An elegant main bathroom and thoughtful features such as motion-sensor exterior lights complete the sophisticated ensemble.
neighborhood_description: The Polnocne neighborhood in Suwalki offers a serene respite from city bustle, with low urban hustle and a leisurely lifestyle pace. A well-kept network of adjacent country roads and close highway access allows for easy city commutes or weekend escapes. Enjoy convenient proximity to shopping and intimate local dining options, as well as access to beautiful nearby lakes and lush green spaces ideal for active outdoor pursuits.
target_buyer: Ideal for discerning professionals or families seeking a unique property with historic roots and modern amenities in a peaceful location. Luxury-oriented buyers who value space, character, and elegant details will be captivated.
market_positioning: A rare find in Suwalki, this beautifully restored historic loft stands as a premier bespoke offering for those seeking a harmonious blend of classic charm and upscale loft living. Positioned in a quiet yet well-connected area, it is tailor-made for luxury-minded buyers.
